What book is The movie Edge of Doom based on?

The movieEdge of Doom is based on the bookThe Edge of Doom. [A Novel.].written by  Leo BRADY (Dramatist.)

The Edge of Doom. [A Novel.]. 1/1/1950

Did you know that the movie Edge of Doom is based on the book The Edge of Doom. [A Novel.].?

A poor and alienated young man (Farley Granger) who is driven to murder when a priest refuses to give is deceased mother an expensive funeral. The film explores the crippling poverty that has prevented the youth from marrying or providing his mother with enough comforts, and has led to his crime. Dana Andrews plays the compassionate assistant of the slain priest who brings about the tormented killer's repentance.

  • Internet Movie Database:  6.4/10

Do you want to have more information about The Edge of Doom. [A Novel.]., or tell what you think about the book adaptation? Leave a comment.
